snippet.title: PAVILION - Release trailer - Chapter 1
snippet.description:
Pavilion - the fourth person puzzling adventure out now on:
Steam - http://store.steampowered.com/app/417150
Humble Store - https://www.humblebundle.com/store/pavilion
NVIDIA SHIELD - https://shield.nvidia.com/games/android/pavilion

Read the whole release announcement: 
http://www.visiontrick.com/blog/pavilion-release-announcement/

Pavilion, the fourth-person puzzling adventure from Visiontrick Media, throws you directly into its mysterious world without any text tutorials or beginning explanations. It is a puzzle game portrayed through exploration and audio-visual imagery. By interacting and observing you gradually, bit by bit, learn things about both the puzzling gameplay and the world itself.

Pavilion takes place in a world unknown to both the player and the main character. A surreal dream-like place where reality clash with fantasy. Fully realized in beautiful hand-crafted 2d graphics and dreamy ambient music that makes for an unforgettable audio-visual experience.

Read more at http://inthepavilion.com
